name: Migracciones
description:
Migracciones is a serious game that tells the story of Raul's journey over Mexico to the USA. Through the dice, you go through the main routes that migrants use, where there will be boxes that tell a little story of common events that migrants go through.

Migrations is a game still in development, and its main pillar is the narrative aspect.
